Description: Expenses related to maintaining outdated systems (e.g., bug fixes, patches, updates).
Loss of efficiency in day-to-day operations due to outdated technology (e.g., slower processing times, lack of automation).
Increased vulnerabilities and associated costs of managing risks (e.g., security breaches, compliance issues).
Impact on the productivity of developers working with legacy systems (e.g., longer time to implement changes).
Costs of transitioning from legacy systems (if no AI is used, the cost would be significantly higher).
